mapper.select: select a.*, b.teamname as team1, c.teamname as team2, d.* from gamerecord a, team b, team c, referee d where a.teamcode=b.teamcode and a.teamcode2=c.teamcode and a.refereenumber=d.refereenumber and a.sportType=#{sport}

select a.*, b.teamName as teamName1, b.emblem as emblem1, c.teamName as teamName2, c.emblem as emblem2 from gameRecord a, team b, team c where a.teamCode=b.teamCode and a.teamCode2=c.teamCode and (b.teamName=#{teamName} or c.teamName=#{teamName}) and a.gameState='경기 종료'
